code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[data,setData]=useState({});const[location,setLocation]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const url="https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=".concat(location,"&appid=cc573655e6857b05ad3c7a1b72d38585");const searchLocation=event=>{if(event.key==='Enter'&&location.trim()!==''){setLoading(true);axios.get(url).then(response=>{setData(response.data);console.log(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching data:',error);alert('Location not found.
